Summary: A low flying orb shaped projectile, travelling per
divs: Sighting Details The object is saw was simply a rapidly travellingsphere, silver in color, approximately three feet in diameter. It was travellingperhaps 80-90 mph, maybe a little more. It couldnt have been more than 40 feetoff the ground travelling in a beeline through my suburban neighborhood. I sawit briefly, perhaps for about 3 seconds as it raced through the subdivision.This is the first one of these I have ever seen, but I have seen UFO craft onthree separate occasions, dating back to 1973 in Key West Florida
